{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\Qteams: Team System - teams; assignments: Holds team assignment details; assignmentattachments: Stores assignment attachments; users: User System - users; submissions: Manages assignee submission details; submissionattachments: Contains submission attachments; Assignment System ER Diagram Relation mappings: A team can post any amount of assignments; (Optional) An assignment is issued by a single team; (Mandatory) An assignment may have many assignmentattachments; (Optional) An assignmentattachment is for a single assignment; (Mandatory) An assignment can be assigned for many submissions (to assignees); (Optional) A user can be assigned to many submissions (as assignee); (Optional) A submission is only for one assignment; (Mandatory) A submission may contain multiple submissionattachments; (Optional) A submissionattachment is only for one submission; (Mandatory) They will be justified below.\\E$"}
